title: Establishes a coordinated statewide policy, investigation, and reporting requirements with respect to infections, including certain staphylococcus infections
summary: Establishes a coordinated statewide policy, investigation, and reporting requirements with respect to infections, including certain staphylococcus infections.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law and the public health law, in relation to establishing a coordinated statewide policy, investigation and reporting requirements with respect to infections, including certain staphylococcus infections
